mapper.select:
SELECT `product_index` AS `productIndex`, `detail_index` AS `detailIndex`, `menu`.`index`AS `menuIndex`, `product_name` AS `productName`, `price` AS `price`, `content` AS `content`, `view` AS `view`, `created_on` AS `createdOn`, `modified_on` AS `modifiedOn`, `amount` AS `amount`, `on_sale` AS onSale, `sale_quantity` AS `saleQuantity`
FROM `bbqmall`.`products` LEFT JOIN `bbqmall`.`detail_menu` on `products`.`detail_index` = `detail_menu`.`index` LEFT JOIN `bbqmall`.`menus` AS `menu` on `detail_menu`.`menu_index` = `menu`.`index`
WHERE `detail_index` = #{detailIndex}
WHERE `menu`.`index` = 1
WHERE `menu`.`index` = 2
WHERE `menu`.`index` = 3
ORDER BY `modified_on` DESC

SELECT `index` AS `index`, `product_index` AS `productIndex`
FROM `bbqmall`.`product_images` WHERE `product_index` = #{productIndex} ORDER BY `index`
SELECT `index` AS `index`, `product_index` AS `productIndex`, `data` AS `data`, `type` AS `type` FROM bbqmall.`product_images` WHERE `index` = #{index} LIMIT 1;
